title: macbook ir
body: my mac book air can run LOL but i can't buy heroes  and view my profile. its all black. i can play games sometimes. i am waiting for the game but when turn to heroes selection, it became black again then i can't choose my hero then can't play the game. its really bother me.

replies.body: The black screens suggest that you're having a connection issue that is failing to establish communication with the server.  I recommend going over out [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Be sure to select the Mac icon for instructions specific to your OS.  Hit me up if you have any issues after!
hi thanks for help. I've changed my DNS. its still black. i cant even play games now. i wanted to post some screen shot but there is no way to post it.
